bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dian ji 癲疾 , peak-illness, that cannot be cured over an extended period of time. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren bao 人胞 quotes Lin shi jing yan fang 藺氏經驗方 : 久癲失志：氣血弱者。紫河車 治淨，爛煮食之 , “If [a patient] suffers from chronic peak-illness and has lost his mind, and if qi and blood are weak, cleanse a human placenta carefully, boil into a pulp, and eat it”.
